text:
@BBCScotlandNews @IndyG53 @Jackson_Carlaw @NicolaSturgeon If the Westminster government was willing to transparently publish COVID-19 figures in the way @scotgov does then we would all be able to do the comparisons for ourselves.
As it is it tends to suggest they don’t want such comparisons to be made.
